biography: Mikko, a golfer of considerable repute hailing from the esteemed Kurk Golf club, is known for his composed demeanor and strategic approach to the game. While outwardly calm, those who know Mikko well can attest to his burning passion for the sport.

Mikko has graced the fairways of the Hector Trophée on one occasion, bringing a calculated and thoughtful style of play to the competition. Although the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy remain elusive, Mikko's dedication suggests future successes are well within reach.
While Mikko is not expected to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, the world of golf knows well that fortunes can change rapidly, and anticipation remains high for Mikko's next appearance.
